Articles.Content:
i only feel shame cause my comp. can't handle big memory.. this game is awesome but my comp. is olding..

i really like this game.. my favorite game at my steam library.. but man.. this game keep growing..

i feel sad cause i think one day.. my comp. is giving up running this game..
I believe a feature has been added to download older versions of ksp on steam, allowing your computer to keep using her abacus for the calculations ^^
